body.p:
comes with the DITA Open Toolkit which is able to transform a DITA map to various output formats. However DITA Open Toolkit requires local DITA files so first you need to check out a local version of your DITA content.
Once you have a local version of a DITA map just load it in the DITA Maps Manager view and run one of the DITA transformations that are predefined in or a customization of such a predefined DITA transformation.
